name: Old records
description:
'ey lil' dance-to-the-beat thing, put some of my old records on! and try not to break my stuff, will ya?

Arrow keys to move.

Z or space to take a step back.

R to restart a level.


Done in the spare time of a busy weekend all on my own. Sorry about the crappy parts.

All the levels can be finished without breaking anything.
